thread.title: `Preggers` Chrissy Teigen makes first public appearance post announcement
thread.title_full: `Preggers` Chrissy Teigen makes first public appearance post announcement - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: `Preggers` Chrissy Teigen makes first public appearance post announcement
text:
*Melbourne, Oct. 15(ANI): Chrissy Teigen recently made her first public appearance after she announced that she is expecting her first child with her husband John Legend .*
Melbourne, Oct. 15(ANI): Chrissy Teigen recently made her first public appearance after she announced that she is expecting her first child with her husband John Legend. The 29-year-old pregnant model wore a silky white dress with spaghetti straps during her appearance and she also placed her hand over her stomach for some photographs, while a side profile revealed a tiny bump poking through, reports News.co.au. Previously, when Teigen opened about her fertility issues, she said that she would have had six kids till now if she wouldn't have faced infertility. (ANI) Â»
